GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
spmi: trace: fix stack-out-of-bound access in SPMI tracing functions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit ac730c72bddc889f5610d51d8a7abf425e08da1a, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit a9fce374815d8ab94a3e6259802a944e2cc21408. For more details please see the references link.
